category.name: Active Workspace.Substance Compliance
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Scp0ReportedConcentration.scp0ReportedAmountValue.FORMATSTRING
preference.preference_description: Specifies the format to be used to display the value of the scp0ReportedAmountValue property for objects of type: Scp0ReportedConcentration. Default value: ##.#### Here # indicates a positive numeral. A value is displayed if it adds to the accuracy of the number, but not if it is a leading zero or a zero at the end of a decimal. For example, 10.1234 is a valid value and is displayed as is. However, if the value is 09.1000, then 9.1 is displayed.
